definitions.definition: Hair or wool of a sheep or similar animal
Insulating skin with the wool attached
A textile similar to velvet, but with a longer pile that gives it a softness and a higher sheen.
(roofing) Mat or felts composed of fibers, sometimes used as a membrane backer.
Any soft woolly covering resembling a fleece.
The fine web of cotton or wool removed by the doffing knife from the cylinder of a carding machine.
To con or trick (someone) out of money.
To shear the fleece from (a sheep or other animal).
definitions.example: During spring shearing we have to fleece all the sheep in just a few days.

definitions.definition: To cover with, or as if with, wool.
